snippet: In 10 key states, the presidential campaigns spent $22.8 million on local Spanish-language media outlets, or just 6.2 percent of the total spent on advertising in those states.
abstract: In 10 key states, the presidential campaigns spent $22.8 million on local Spanish-language media outlets, or just 6.2 percent of the total spent on advertising in those states.

headline.main: A Rare Quiet Zone During the Presidential Election: Spanish-Language Media
